name: Mind Flayer
lore: Mind flayers, also known as illithids, are psionic aberrations that dwell deep in the Underdark. These alien tyrants sustain themselves by devouring the brains of other creatures, using their potent mental powers to dominate and enslave lesser beings. They serve elder brain colonies, plotting to reclaim dominion over the worlds they once ruled.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The mind flayer has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Telepathic Hub
traits.description: While the mind flayer is conscious, it can use its telepathy to initiate and maintain telepathic conversations with up to ten creatures at a time. The mind flayer can let those creatures telepathically hear each other while connected in this way.

multiattack.description: The mind flayer makes two Tentacle attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Extract Brain if it has a creature grappled.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 15) and must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or have the Stunned condition until the grapple ends.

hit.additionalEffects: If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 15) and must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or have the Stunned condition until the grapple ends.

savingThrow.targets: the target, if Medium or smaller

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft., one creature Grappled by the mind flayer. Hit: 55 (10d10) Piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

attack.targets: one creature Grappled by the mind flayer

hit.additionalEffects: If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast
actions.description: The mind flayer emits psychic energy in a 60-foot Cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw, taking 22 (4d8 + 4) Psychic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a creature also has the Stunned condition for 1 minute. A Stunned creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

onSuccess.effects: The effect ends on the creature.
